store.description0:
Have you ever thought about your earnings per second? Or understanding how subscribing to anything would affect your finances?

Paychecks, bills, investments, savings, mortgage payments, and other obligations might be stressful because there are so many of them.

With Lucra, you can view them all at once and track your earnings and expenses in real time without performing any additional computations. A comprehensive balance of everything is also shown.

Although you cannot save money with us, you can at least save some time.
store.keywords: Lucra, mortgage, rent, investment, money, salary, saves

valid_url: This is not a valid URL
name: Name
delete_desc: This balance will be removed from your list
write_review_desc: We've noticed you like Lucra. It'd be awesome if you can leave a review
dont_ask_again: No, and don't ask me again

slides.description0: Keep track of your spending and savings so you can see how much you are spending and saving in real time
slides.description1: You don't need to perform any calculations. Add your salary, other sources of income, as well as your outgoing costs (gym, insurance, mortgage, etc.). Your account balance will be displayed by year, month, day, hour, minute, and even by second
slides.description2: As examples, we've added a salary (in green) and a mortgage (in red) to Balances. When you click on any of them, you will see their individual balances in real time. You also have the option of viewing everything in the Total view. Update or remove them, then add yours

tour.balances_page:
This is your balances page. In here, you will find different and regular incomes and expenses.

We created a couple of them as an example.
tour.incomes:
Green cards are incomes. These cards could be salary, payments received or any other positive profit.

You can see name, total amount, frequency and date.
tour.expenses:
Same thing with the expenses. These ones could be mortgage, subscriptions, payments or any other negative profit.

The details are similar to incomes.
tour.add_button: You can now remove these examples and start creating yours.

app0.title: My Rents
app0.desc: Manage your properties including leasing, expenses, contracts, tenants, etc.

app1.title: Mind your Math
app1.desc: Make math exciting for your kids! Watch them master arithmetic through interactive exercises and assess their knowledge with engaging exams. Track their progress and celebrate their achievements together

app2.title: TimeTap
app2.desc: Multiplayer and online game where you have to stop a timer in exactly 5 seconds. Easy to play, difficult to master

app3.title: Party Words
app3.desc: Multiplayer game where you have to compete against other teams recreating words by mimic and drawings without saying any word. Be the fastest and most creative!
